name: Compact Amadeus SellConnect
description:
Restyle of Amadeus SellConnect with a focus on:
- a more sleek and compact use of the toolbars
- creating more real estate for the Command Page interface
- making a dedicated room for the Command History widget
- remove Add Banner
additional_info:
Created and tested for build:
Site Code = J0PMJ0PM
Site Language = US
Release = 23.1
Technical Build = 23.1.21

Different builds and licences are not guaranteed to fully work
